headline: Is Target’s (TGT) Beauty Overhaul a Signal of Deeper Shifts in Its Retail Playbook?
summary: In late January 2026, Target announced its largest-ever Spring beauty assortment in stores and online, featuring trend-led brands, expanded textured-hair offerings, and a fully refreshed in-store beauty experience designed around how shoppers browse by trend and need. On February 1, 2026, community-led brand being haircare joined Target’s revamped haircare aisle with inclusive, texture-specific products at accessible prices, underscoring Target’s focus on differentiated beauty to address...

headline: 57-year-old Dividend King makes $5 billion move to protect payout
summary: Target Corporation has quietly become one of retail's most reliable dividend stocks, delivering 57 straight years of payout increases. That streak now faces its toughest test yet as Target (TGT) navigates what COO Michael Fiddelke called a "period of transformation" marked by softening sales ...

summary: Amid declines over the last 12 months, Costco stock is rising again.
